column1: 130kph, good length, on off, hint of away swing, he pushes firmly back to the bowler
130kph, pushed on the up, in the air for a little bit wide of mid on for one
full outswinger, driven with a short arm jab to cover
leading edge, flies safely to cover-point, they run and Cartwright fields easily and shies at the non-striker's but misses he would have been miles out!
126kph, good length, he square drives on the up to point
back of a length, nipping into the thigh guard and dropping down on the off side
137kph, full, yorker length outside off, and it just goes under the bat through to the keeper
a touch of width and short enough, he slashes a cut shot past backward point! He hammered that
magnificent square drive on the up through cover-point! Slightly fuller but again there is width and no swing and he throws the hands through it
129kph, back of a length, climbing outside off, he defends off the back foot to cover
137kph, good length, shaping in to off, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler
136kph, short ball pulled in the air but short of the man coming in from wide fine leg
advances at a good length ball that shapes and bounces and beats the edge as he flays at it
123kph, good length angled into off, he defends slowly wide of mid on
he walks down the track and tries to launch this straight but it swings away and beats the edge!
135kph, shorter into the hip, it hits thew thigh pad as he misses trying to tuck this down to fine leg
huge appeal for caught behind, given not out. It was a good length outside off, nipped back beat the edge and caught the back elbow! The Scorchers were convinced it was bat but a great decision.
slices a drive, off the thick edge that flies through the vacant gully region to third man
130kph, good length on off, he pushes a drive to mid on
135kph, back of a length on middle, he defends with soft hands to midwicket and they pinch a tight but well run one
135kph, back of a length, nipping back into the back thigh, cuts him in half and rolls to slip
135kph, lofts this straight of mid off! It was a good length and he just extended the arms through the line lofting this straight of mid off, didn't nail it but it's a short boundary
129kph, hit on the back thigh, trying to swing this over midwicket, it nipped off the seam and beat the inside edge. A stifled appeal but it was going well over
sliced high in the air over backward point but it falls just safe of wide third man! He tried to hammer this inside out, he sliced it very high but Richardson couldn't get there
slight leading edge trying to turn the face into the legside, it falls safe next to the pitch
130kph, lofted over long off and it goes all the way! Slightly fuller and he swing through the line, leaning back and gets all of it!

leading edge caught at wide mid off! Perfect length outside off, extra bounce, he closes the face trying to work to midwicket, gets a thick leading edge, Tye runs to his right from mid off and takes the catch sliding on his knees on the circle!
129kph, good length on off, he tucks this with the angle to the gap at midwicket
full outside off, he steps back and across outside off and turns this with soft hands through square leg
131kph, half-volley, he drives elegantly to wide mid off and goes with the stroke
132kph, full outside off, he drives hard to mid off who is back on the circle
131kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and across and running this down the third man with soft hands
back of a length, climbing off a length, he defends off the sticker of the bat to his feet
136kph, high bouncer that is too high, well over the head
134kph, shorter onto the hip, he tries to pull over short fine but it comes off the thigh pad and they get an extra
good length, 138kph, good length, top of off, he defends to midwicket
131kph, good length outside off, he steps way back and across his stumps trying to slog it over the leg side and misses, he gets hit on the thigh
run out chance, Cartwright misses! He defended to point and ran, Cartwright just cruised in to gather and throw at the striker's and Ingram gave up! But he missed by miles
back of a length, defended off the back foot to point

caught at cover! Back of a length outside off, he tries to flat bat this over wide mid on, some extra bounce and pace gets the ball onto him quickly, he slices it off the stickers high to cover and Turner camps under it to take an easy catch
129kph, fuller length on middle and off, he drives neatly straight of mid on
133kph, full swinging into middle and leg, driven beautifully straight to mid on
130kph, back of a length angled across the right hander, he defends wide of the slip in place and pinches one
good length angled into the top of off, he defends back to the bowler
steps outside off early, Richardson reacts and fires full and wide, he whips to midwicket who is in saving one
beaten driving on the up at a 140kph fuller length delivery on a sixth stump line wide of off
chopped on! 142kph, good length outside off, he pressed forward trying to push into the off side but got an inside edge with angled bat down onto his heel and bounces back onto leg stump!
136kph, shorter length outside off, he pulls but mistimes it wide of mid on for a single
short ball, 141kph, well directed at the head, he is late trying to pull around the corner, just gets away to the circle behind square, he pushes for two but elects not to go
good length into the hip, he tucks it to square leg
133kph, shorter length on middle, it bounces considerably, he's back and defending to midwicket
short ball, tries to pull but mistimes to midwicket, wants one but it's not on
full into leg stump, he clips this hard to wide mid on and takes on the man, Agar fires and hits but he beats the throw
136kph, good length outside off, he drives on the up and misses and it flies through to the keeper
good length, angled into middle and off, he defends from the crease back to the bowler
145kph, rocket, angled across, he backs away and swings hard but misses
112kph, slower ball, he backs away outside leg, he follows and cramps him for room
huge swing and a miss again! This was on speed back of a length over middle he tries to launch it over long on but was beaten by the bounce
shorter length into the hip, he backs away but can't tuck it away, he's taken on the thigh

a horror mix up! What on earth happened here?! He drives to mid on, calls yes, then no, Turner throws at the non-striker's misses, Coulter-Nile backs up and fires again, Wells gets back but Carey had kept running, Turner takes it again and throws to the striker's end and Carey is miles out running back! Chaos
caught at fine leg! A golden duck! This is a quick well directed bouncer, he half ducked and half hooked, got a top edge and it carried to Behrendorff running in from fine leg!
138kph, short lifter outside off, he fends off the gloves into the gully
caught behind! 129kph shorter length outside off, he tries to run to third man but is beaten by extra bounce, gets a thick edge and Inglis dives to his right and takes an excellent catch!
good length outside off, climbing, he beats the edge and it flies over off stump!
slashed on the up just wide of backward point and it races away! Brave shot on the up but that releases some pressure
edged in the air through the vacant gully to third man, he was defending from the crease
lifting delivery, a brute, he fends off the gloves infront of his face! It drops down safely onto the leg side and they get one
148kph, yorker wide of off, he tries to jam it away to third man but misses

LBW! A brave decision. This was 136kph, good length, nipping back, he's caught on the crease, it hit the top of the back pad and is given out! Height was a factor. But the umpire deemed it was hitting the top of leg stump!
fuller into leg stump and he clips this through forward square
138kph, good length way wide of off and nipping away, he had a huge swing and miss with his feet anchored
137kph, sprayed well down the leg side
139kph, short ball over off stump, he sways underneath it and inside the line
139kph, half-volley smoked through cover, Klinger has to work hard to right at deep point and makes an excellent diving save

appeal for a run out after a direct hit! It's gone upstairs. He is just in! A short ball, fended to point, Rashid backed up a long way, Cartwright races in and fires at the non-striker's and hits but Rashid is just back
full and wide and he cracks a square drive backward of point! What a stroke
opens the face and runs it wide of slip off the edge and it is fine of third man! Two in a row
back of a length on off, he defends with the open face and runs it down to third man
short bumper outside off, he leans back and tries to upper cut but misses
a tennis type smash flies wide of fine leg and over the rope! Incredible shot! It was a high bouncer over his head and he tried the overhead smash it flies with the pace wide of fine leg! Amazing
128kph, half volley, driven through cover, straight of deep point for a couple
129kph, good length, top of off, he defends with an open face to third man
launched over midwicket into the upper deck! 93m! He hung back, got one in the slot and swung as hard as he could and nailed it! He hit this so well
slower ball outside off, he swings hard and misses trying to go straight down the ground
118kph, leg cutter slower ball, he sits back and clears the front leg to swing hard again but misses
skips down the track to a slower ball, gets it off the end of the bat as he tries to loft over long on, it drops down on the off side
good length on off, he defends from the crease back to the bowler
another run out chance! 129kph, He defends fine of backward point and calls one, Cartwright moves well to his left, fires and misses, Rashid was well short
yorker outside off, he squeezes it out to backward point
129kph, bouncer came off the helmet! It flew over the keeper's head for four! And given runs!
137kph, sliced up and over backward point into the gap! Full and wide and he cashes in, carving it away wide of backward point
136kph, he steps way outside leg trying to club this over cover and misses it by a long way
131kph, full into leg stump, he turns this straight to midwicket
good length, on off, it climbs at 127kph and he defends off the sticker of the bat
back of a length, nipping away, 129kph, he stays back and opens the face to run to third man and it wizzes past the edge!

caught at midwicket! Coulter-Nile takes a stunner! Short ball, chest high, he plays a good pull shot, rolling the wrists, Coulter-Nile is close at midwicket, he flings his right hand low to his right and plucks it one-handed inches off the turf! What a catch
132kph, full into the pads and it rolls away to midwicket
shorter slower ball into the hip, takes him on the thigh guard and drops down

caught at deep midwicket! This was a towering skier! He swung hard and launched a length ball high into the twilight sky, Coulter-Nile comes in from deep midwicket, well off the rope, camps under it and takes the catch well infront of his eyes.
good length ball, on off, 130kph, slapped back to the bowler who fields well in his follow through
high bouncer, he tries to upper cut but it climbs over the bat
back of a length, quite short, he tries to flash it over point but misses
133kph, wide of off, he slices an edge in the air down to third man but it falls well short of Klinger running in
good length, angled down leg, 127kph, comes off the pad and runs down to fine leg
good length, swung away to deep midwicket
slower ball, well bowled, he swings hard and misses outside off

caught by mid off running back! Good length slower ball outside off, he tries to loft over mid off, and mistimes it, Klinger backs back from inside the circle and takes an excellent catch above his head backpedaling.
134kph, chest high short ball and it is hammered through midwicket! Magnificent pull shot! He was so quick to seize the length and smoke this forward of square
good length outside off, 132kph, he leans into a drive on the up through the gap at cover-point, nicely timed
back of a length, off stump line, 127kph, he defends off the back foot down onto his foot and it rolls to point
back of a length on off, 132kph, he's back and defending close into the leg side and they pinch a tight one despite Wells hitting the stumps at the striker's end with a diving underarm
133kph, good length angled into the pad, he tries to whip behind square but it comes off the pad
shorter length, 134kph, outside off, he defends to cover
142kph, but full and well down the leg side
beaten trying to force square off the back foot, to a 143kph, leg cutter climbing from a length outside off
144kph, fuller on middle, he drives nicely with the full face to mid on
beaten on the inside edge. 137kph, shorter length, nipping back through the gate over off, as he tried to drive off the back foot
137kph, almost a yorker length, angled into off, he defends this well into the off side
143kph, short into the ribs and he swivels on a pull shot, lifting it, helping it on it's way wide of fine leg, one bounce four!
138kph, full on off, he drives on the up to mid off
nearly a run out! He pushes a drive slowly to mid off, Laughlin runs in gathers and underarms Jonty Rhodes style and misses! Klinger was well short diving to get home
clinical straight drive! Full half-volley on off, he hits the perfect straight drive just past the stumps to the sightscreen!
better length, 134kph, he drives on the up, doesn't quite time it to mid off
good length, outside off, he presses forward and defends with an open face through the gully to third man
back of a length, wide of off, 135kph, he is back and forcing with a vertical bat to point
129kph, angled into leg stump, he just tucks this easily behind square
short wide of off, 141kph, he tries to cut but is beaten for pace and bounce

run out! Brilliant direct hit from Laughlin! He got him this time! He drives straight of mid off, Laughlin at full pace to his right, gathers in one hand and throws in the same motion and hits at the non-striker's end! Klinger was nearly run out in a previous over by Laughlin, he needed a sighter and got him second time! He was well short
good length, middle and off, 137kph, he defends from the crease to mid on
141kph, short outside off, fifth stump, he runs a late cut down to third man
144kph, back of a length, he defends with soft hands on the back foot, dropping it to his feet and Inglis calls him through. Well run
back of a length outside off, he tries to upper cut again but misses
99kph leg break, outside off, he defends on the front foot
wrong un, shorter and spinning down leg
wrong un, 93kph, short on the hip, he tucks it off the hip behind square to the sweeper
shorter leg break on leg, he's back and working this through square leg to the sweeper
97kph, slider pushed through on middle, he defends squared up on the crease
100kph, pushed through, sliding down leg, it comes off pad and rolls fine of short fine
87kph, wrong un, shorter and wide of off, he goes back to cut but it zips off the surface past the edge
good length, 136kph, defending to square leg, they take on Weatherald who misfields! If he gathered and threw, Bosisto was in real trouble
short bouncer wide of off, he tries to upper cut over third man but misses
cracking pull shot over square leg! He didn't nail it but controlled a 142kph, chest high short ball and got enough of it well over square leg and it rolls to the rope

caught behind! Brute of a delivery! This climbs off a length, 140kph plus, he went back to force through the off side, it climbed and got big on him, it just brushes the glove and flies through to Carey! That is an incredible delivery.
back of a length on leg stump, he defends with soft hands towards mid on and they run well
good length, 142kph, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot to cover
shorter wrong un, he punches back to the bowler
quicker leg break into leg stump, defending to midwicket
full leg break outside off, he drives and gets a thick edge to short third man
beaten playing back to a 96kph leg break that zips past the edge outside off
fast leg break, on off, he stays back and defends off the stumps, 101kph, he exposed off and middle
shorter leg break, 92kph, he's back and punching down to long on
good length, top of off, 139kph, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler
short and wide, 135kph, he cuts off the back foot straight to backward point
good length, wide of off, 141kph, he tries to force through the off side from the crease, chops it off the inside edge onto his foot and it rolls away and they pinch a single
shorter length, not that wide, 137kph, he cuts but it's not well timed to point
he backs away early, it's a full straight yorker, fired in at middle, he squeezes it out to mid on
check drive straight of mid on! He backed away again, it was full and straight, he just checked his shot, pushing it straight of mid on but he timed it well enough to beat the man
leg break, pushed through on leg, 95kph, he's back, punching back to the bowler
full on middle, he mistimes a push  on the front foot to mid on and they pinch one
beaten, 97kph, leg break wide of off, he pressed out to defend and it ripped past the edge
wrong un, he picked it, went back and defended neatly to the gap at square leg
top spinner, outside off, he's back, staying leg side and pushing this to the gap at point

93kph, quicker wrong un, he's back and defending behind square, Turner calls him through, Carey runs out from behind the stumps, slides and turns and throws at the striker's stumps in one motion but misses and it beats the man backing up. They get an overthrow
132kph, angled into the pads, it comes off the pad as he tries to clip it away and it rolls away for an extra
134kph, good length on off, he defends off the thick outside edge to point
short ball outside off, he pulls hard through forward square but the sweeper cuts it off
back of a length, 128kph, off stump, he stands up to force down the ground and gets a thick inside edge to fine leg
slower ball, curves away wide of off, he drives on the up through cover-point to the sweeper
good length, off stump, he stands up and punches off the back foot to mid off
good length, 130kph, leg stump, he glances this easily to fine leg
off spinning slower ball, he pushes firmly towards mid off who is on the circle and they run a single
133kph, fuller length, outside off, he drives hard to deep cover
full angled into leg stump, he clips this to the man at deep square leg
off spinning slower ball, on leg, he glances to fine leg
good length, into leg stump, he works this off the front foot to midwicket
bouncer, 136kph, he hooks, not in control but nails it between fine leg and deep backward square!
130kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler
127kph, fuller outside off, he drives fluently but straight to cover
cracking cover drive on the up but picks out the man who is very close! Well handled by the man at cover
slower ball, curve ball, 115kph, he check drives mistiming this to cover
shorter length on off, he stands up and punches with the full face down the ground
shorter outside off and he cuts to deep point
drifting way down leg and he sweeps hard past short fine! That's a freebie and Bosisto doesn't miss out.
fuller outside off, he defends to the gap at point
good length on off, he's back and defending
shorter leg break, he stands up and punches back to the bowler
looped up on leg stump, he drives down to long on
shorter length leg break, he defends to cover-point off the back foot
shorter outside off, he punches off the back foot to cover point
tossed up on off, he presses forward and defends to cover
wrong un, he defends on the front foot to cover
full top spinner, he drives straight to cover
leg break, 93kph, fired wide of off, he leaves this alone
good length on leg, he backs away to push through the off side, gets a thick inside edge through midwicket
good length outside off, he tries to drive on the up through cover and misses
122kph, back of a length on off, he defends square of cover and pinches a single
full and straight, he pushes on the front foot wide of mid off
slower ball, back of a length, off stump, he chips this in the air for a short way through mid on to the man in the deep at long on
131kph, full angled into off, he clips this straight to midwicket
lofted cover drive inside out to the rope! Two men in the circle at cover and mid off and he drives up and over cover, beautiful shot.
shorter ball, pulled to deep backward square with control
124kph, bouncer, he tries to pull but it flies over his head and is called wide for height
slower ball, full toss, on leg, he whips hard to deep forward square
back of a length, on off, he defends short of cover and they run well
full yorker on off, he squeezes it out to mid on
13kph, half-volley and he smokes a drive back at Laughlin and it ricochet's off his shin!! Ouch. He is OK. And it's a dot ball
good length, 128kph, outside off, he pushes gently to mid off on the circle for an easy one
good length, into leg stump, 139kph, he defends towards midwicket
overstepped! And he was caught down the leg side! Not out and a free hit! He glanced it fine, Carey took a screamer, a juggling catch diving left. Looked up and it was given not out.
slower ball, wide of off, he misses, and it's called wide
full outside off, driven back to the bowler and he hurls it back at the stumps in frustration
shorter outside off, he flat bats a pull down to long on
122kph, full almost a yorker length outside off, he jams it out with the bottom hand to midwicket
124kph, outside off, half-volley, smacks a full blooded drive to long on
slower ball, off spinner, he whips this in the air straight of deep square leg for a couple

run out chance! It's sent upstairs. He turns this down to fine leg and takes on the throw from Stanlake trying for a second, Carey breaks the stumps, he's diving at full stretch! This is tight! There's one frame in it and he got home. Just.
128kph, good length on off, he gets and inside edge onto pad, it rolls into the on side for one
bowled him! He wanted to end it with one blow! He backed away to a fuller straighter ball, tried to launch this down the ground, it nips through the gate and crashes into middle and leg!
good length, defending to cover-point and they try for a sharp single, the throw went to the wrong end! Bosisto was in trouble if it went to the striker's
smoked off the pads behind square! That's the way to end it. Angled into the pads and he flicked it away emphatically.
